attributes.action: Withdrawn all troops out of Afghanistan not for political reasons but to save the lives of our brave young Service Men and Women.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having served in the Armed Forces for 24 years joining shortly after the victorious Falklands War I felt that I could make a difference and serve my country.   First under Tony Blair and now Gordon Brown too many lives are being placed at risk and lost for what?   No one knows.   The equipment is not sufficient for the job, ageing planes, helicopters and most importantly vehicles.   This is now becoming the British Vietnam War, how many more must die needlessly?  Gordon Brown stand up like a man and say "No more" bring our troops home.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
